Friday, January 17, 2025 
Today is a “B” Day 

Club Meetings and Information 

  • The Heritage Garden Club is offering two scholarships for Maple Ave. Middle School students in grades 6-7 to attend Camp Colby in the Adirondacks free for one week this summer! Camp Colby offers fun and adventure with hands-on science lessons, games, and outdoor exploration led by experienced counselors. For more details and how to apply, see your science teacher or Mr. Scrivo! Applications are due January 24. 
  • 7th grade dance tickets will be sold during lunch for 5 dollars from the 21st to the 24th. 
  • MAGSA will have its next meeting on Wednesday, January 22nd in room 138. 
  • Maple Avenue – Time is running out to Pre-order your 2025 Middle School Yearbook! Yearbooks are $15 + tax and can be ordered only via this link or the QR code on your hand out. The last day to order will be Monday, February 24th! 
  • The Maple Avenue Musical Club proudly announces its production of Matilda! Featuring 73 talented middle school students, this heartwarming show promises to captivate audiences of all ages with its inspiring story, vibrant music, and lively performances.  Please see this link for more information. 
  • Today we will have our S.E.L. lesson during Block 2. It will be based on January’s Character Trait of the month, which is Flexibility. We hope you enjoy the activity! 

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
